price: 35. Baye bazalaka soki nkombo ya Allah etangami, mitema mia bango milengi, mpe soki mabe ezui bango bakangi mitema, Mpe batelemisi losambo mpe bazali kobimisa maye topesaki bango, (тропа Allah)
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّهُ وَجِلَتۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ وَٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَصَابَهُمۡ وَٱلۡمُقِيمِي ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
